title: Critical Mirth Connect Vulnerability Could Expose Sensitive Healthcare Data
description:
Mirth Connect versions prior to 4.4.1 are vulnerable to CVE-2023-43208, a bypass for an RCE vulnerability.

The post Critical Mirth Connect Vulnerability Could Expose Sensitive Healthcare Data appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Hackers Earn $350k on Second Day at Pwn2Own Toronto 2023
description:
Smart speakers, printers, routers, NAS devices, and mobile phones were hacked on the second day at Pwn2Own Toronto 2023.

The post Hackers Earn $350k on Second Day at Pwn2Own Toronto 2023 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: AI Security Firm Cranium Raises $25 Million
description:
AI cybersecurity firm Cranium has raised $25 million in Series A funding, which brings the total investment in the company to $32 million.

The post AI Security Firm Cranium Raises $25 Million appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Key Learnings from “Big Game” Ransomware Campaigns
description:
There are key steps every organization should take to leverage threat and event data across the lifecycle of a cyber incident.

The post Key Learnings from “Big Game” Ransomware Campaigns appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Kansas Court System Down Nearly 2 Weeks in ‘Security Incident’ That Has Hallmarks of Ransomware
description:
Kansas is calling a massive computer outage that’s kept most of the state’s courts offline for 2 weeks a “security incident” and experts say it's likely ransomware.

The post Kansas Court System Down Nearly 2 Weeks in ‘Security Incident’ That Has Hallmarks of Ransomware appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: CISA, HHS Release Cybersecurity Healthcare Toolkit
description:
CISA and the HHS have released resources for healthcare and public health organizations to improve their security.

The post CISA, HHS Release Cybersecurity Healthcare Toolkit appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: iLeakage Attack Exploits Safari to Steal Sensitive Data From Macs, iPhones
description:
New iLeakage side-channel speculative execution attack exploits Safari to steal sensitive information from Macs and iPhones.

The post iLeakage Attack Exploits Safari to Steal Sensitive Data From Macs, iPhones appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Google Announces Bug Bounty Program and Other Initiatives to Secure AI
description:
Google announces a bug bounty program and other initiatives for increasing the safety and security of AI.

The post Google Announces Bug Bounty Program and Other Initiatives to Secure AI appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Japanese Watchmaking Giant Seiko Confirms Personal Data Stolen in Ransomware Attack
description:
Japanese watchmaking giant Seiko has confirmed that personal information was stolen in a recent ransomware attack.

The post Japanese Watchmaking Giant Seiko Confirms Personal Data Stolen in Ransomware Attack appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Weapons Systems Provide Valuable Lessons for ICS/OT Security
description:
Cybersecurity techniques and penetration testing used in the field of weapons systems can provide valuable lessons for ICS/OT security.

The post Weapons Systems Provide Valuable Lessons for ICS/OT Security appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Amazon Rolls Out Independent Cloud for Europe to Address Stricter Privacy Standards
description:
Amazon is rolling out an independent cloud for Europe as it looks to address strict regulations that companies and those in the public sector face in the European Union.

The post Amazon Rolls Out Independent Cloud for Europe to Address Stricter Privacy Standards appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Day 3 of SecurityWeek’s 2023 ICS Cybersecurity Conference — Challenges and Solutions
description:
SecurityWeek’s 2023 ICS Cybersecurity Conference continues in Atlanta, with challenges and solutions the focus of Day 3.
